ActPension Benefits Standards Act, 1985
SubjectCanada Post Corporation Pension Plan Funding Regulations
PrecisOrder making the CANADA POST CORPORATION PENSION PLAN FUNDING REGULATIONS in order to (1) provide Canada Post with temporary relief from its solvency payment obligations; (2) prohibit plan amendments that would have the effect of granting a benefit improvement; and (3) require that Canada Post disclose to members, retirees and other beneficiaries the solvency payments that would have been made under the normal funding rules and that the plan is being funded in accordance with the Regulations.
